content: this listing is a crochet pattern only file in pdf format but not a finished crochet easter eggs amigurumi crochet easter eggs pattern is available in english us terms language ***** pattern includes the description of crocheting of the small and big easter eggs ***** skill level for beginners you need to know how to crochet a magic loop single_crochet to make an increase and decrease materials & tools - yarn you can use any smooth yarn of any structure any thickness and color i used a sport weight yarn 4ply cotton/acrylic yarn 160m/50g - 1 5 mm hook or the other size matching for your yarn - tapestry needle and a thin needle - colored threads for embroidering optional - stitch marker - scissors - polyester fiberfill sizes in height small egg - 4 8 cm 1 9 in height big egg - 6 5 cm 2 55 in height if using the recommended yarn ***** this pattern is instant download © copyright all toys patterns and tutorials are copyright tetiana saienko planet piu this pattern is for personal use only you are not allowed to distribute or copy this pattern or any part of it i do ask you to respect my author s rights thank you for understanding you are allowed to sell or present toys created under this pattern but let your customers know who is the designer of these toys tetiana saienko - planet piu
